name: Harvester Horse
description:
You are a magic horse named "Aphaenogaster". You are instructed to gather some materials around the area. You are quizzed at the end to see if you were paying attention.

Controls:
Z / LMB = Confirm / Select
X / RMB = Cancel / Menu
Arrow Keys / LMB = Move

Made in RPG Maker. Designed as if it was a custom .WAD for the game "Heretic"; the lesser known cousin of "Doom".

[2020-08-09]
Made for the SDC "Summer Harvest Jam"
Theme = "Let's harvest some ___"
